Package ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.separate

Class SeparateHalfspaceDefaultFactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.separate.SeparateHalfspaceAbstractFactor
      • ch.idsia.crema.factor.credal.linear.separate.SeparateHalfspaceDefaultFactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearFactor, SeparateHalfspaceFactor, SeparateLinearFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>, SeparatelySpecified<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>, FilterableFactor<SeparateHalfspaceFactor>, GenericFactor
    public class SeparateHalfspaceDefaultFactor
extends SeparateHalfspaceAbstractFactor
    A separately specified Credal factor that has a list of linear constrains for each separation.
    Author:
    huber

      • filter

        public SeparateHalfspaceDefaultFactor filter​(int variable,
                                             int state)
        Filter the factor by setting a specific variable to a state. This only works when the var is in the grouping/separated part.

        Note that the constraits sets are not copied. So changing this factor will update also the filtered one.

        Parameters:
        variable -
        state -
        Returns:
